checkAvailability.description: Checks calendar availability and returns free time slots for the specified date range.

slotDurationMinutes.description: Duration of each time slot in minutes. Defaults to 45 minutes.

timeMax.description: End of the time range to check (ISO 8601 format, e.g., "2025-11-05T17:00:00-04:00").

timeMin.description: Start of the time range to check (ISO 8601 format, e.g., "2025-11-05T09:00:00-04:00").

timezone.description: Timezone for formatting output (e.g., "America/Toronto"). Defaults to America/Toronto.

busySlots.description: Array of busy time slots in ISO format.

end.description: ISO 8601 formatted end time of the busy slot.

start.description: ISO 8601 formatted start time of the busy slot.

formattedFreeSlots.description: Array of human-readable formatted free slots (e.g., "9:00 AM â€“ 9:45 AM").

freeSlots.description: Array of available time slots in ISO format.

end.description: ISO 8601 formatted end time of the free slot.

start.description: ISO 8601 formatted start time of the free slot.

checkAvailability.title: Check Availability

createEvent.description: Creates a new event in the calendar.

schema.description: The definition of the new event.

attendees.description: List of attendees for the event. Email invitations will be sent automatically.

displayName.description: The name of the attendee. Optional.

email.description: The email address of the attendee.

optional.description: Whether this is an optional attendee. Optional. The default is False.

colorId.description: The color ID of the event. Optional.

description.description: Description of the event. Can contain HTML. Optional.

enableGoogleMeet.description: Whether to enable Google Meet for the event. Optional. The default value is false.

endDateTime.description: The end date and time in RFC3339 format (e.g., "2023-12-31T12:00:00.000Z").

guestsCanInviteOthers.description: Whether attendees other than the organizer can invite others to the event. Optional. The default is True.

guestsCanSeeOtherGuests.description: Whether attendees other than the organizer can see who the event's attendees are. Optional. The default is True.

location.description: Geographic location of the event as free-form text. Optional. (e.g., "Meeting Room").

recurrence.description: List of RRULE, EXRULE, RDATE and EXDATE lines for a recurring event, as specified in RFC5545. This field is omitted for single events or instances of recurring events.

items.description: RRULE, EXRULE, RDATE or EXDATE line, as specified in RFC5545. Note that DTSTART and DTEND lines are not allowed in this field

sendNotifications.description: Whether to send notifications to attendees. Optional. The default value is true.

startDateTime.description: The start date and time in RFC3339 format (e.g., "2023-12-31T10:00:00.000Z").

status.description: Status of the event. Optional. The default value is "confirmed".

visibility.description: Visibility of the event. Optional. The default value is "default".

status.description: Status of the event. Optional. The default value is "confirmed".

createEvent.title: Create Event

deleteEvent.description: Deletes an event from the calendar.

eventId.description: The ID of the calendar event to delete.

deleteEvent.title: Delete Event

count.description: The maximum number of events to return. Defaults to 100.

pageToken.description: Token specifying which result page to return.

timeMin.description: Only return events occurring on or after this date. Must be in RFC3339 format. Defaults to now if not specified.

startDateTime.description: The start date and time in RFC3339 format (e.g., "2023-12-31T10:00:00.000Z").

status.description: Status of the event. Optional. The default value is "confirmed".

nextPageToken.description: Token used to access the next page of this result. Omitted if no further results are available.
